name: OpenKit.io
overview:
OpenKit is the industry’s first completely open platform for backend services for mobile developers, with a guarantee of “no lock-in of developer data.”

With OpenKit, developers get an open source toolkit on iOS and Android to plug into backend services critical to apps in the post-PC era: common services for all types of apps, including a universal account authorization service and a cloud storage service, plus app-specific services such as leaderboards/achievements for game developers.

OpenKit’s open architecture give developers the backend services they need to prosper in the Post-PC era without developer lock-in. To sign up for OpenKit and learn more about how OpenKit empowers app developers please contact us at www.OpenKit.io.
